text: Yesli by ty (o prorok!) uvidel etikh nevernykh, kogda oni budut postavleny pered ognom, tot strakh i uzhas, kotoryy ikh okhvatit, ty by uvidel uzhasnuyu kartinu. Oni khoteli by vernut'sya v blizhayshuyu zhizn', v etot mir, govorya: "Yesli by my byli vozvrashcheny v etot mir, my ispravili by nashi grekhi, ne otritsali by znameniy Allakha i byli by v chisle veruyushchikh
